name: Cave Racer (itch)
description:
Race three laps around a cave against nine AI opponents.

Gamepad recommended.

Left Stick Left/Right: Turn
Left Stick Up/Down: Become "heavy" or "light"
Right Trigger: Accelerate
Left Trigger: Decelerate
Y button: Jump (very slight)
A button: Reset camera (if it goes wonky)

Keyboard works, too.

Left/Right: Turn
Up/Down: Become "heavy" or "light"
X: Accelerate
C: Brake
Space: Jump
R: Reset camera (if it goes wonky)

The arrow pickups increase both acceleration and maximum speed. Get as many as you can!

Also, be sure to explore and experiment. The cave is small and simple but may hold some secrets...
